div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1513 Phoenicia, 1968 or earlier Burial: c. 315 B.C. (M) Contents: 15 AR Alexander III: 9 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 4, Side 1, Baby- lon 3, barb. imit. 1) Philip III: 6 tetradr. (Myriandrus 1, Baby- lon 5) Disposition: private coll. Casts in ANS
